content.prompt: Through both its form and its symbolism, the Vietnam Veterans Memorial is most similar to which of the following works?

choices.label: The Crossing by Bill Viola
Stadia II by Julie Mehretu
A Book from the Sky by Xu Bing
Shibboleth by Doris Salcedo

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
